textAfterTable: BBH Hostel - Anakiwa 401 in Marlborough Sounds Back to Marlborough index View more images Small homely guesthouse and private apartment (formerly ANAKIWA BACKPACKERS). Renovated with historic character & charm. Next to sandy beach & jetty in tranquil Anakiwa Bay at the start/end of the Queen Charlotte Track. Good sealed road access, only 25km from Picton, 15km from Havelock. Go walking, swimming, mountain biking, kayaking (free sit-on top kayaks), boat trips or relax in our native gardens enjoying beautiful view. Cosy lounge. BBQ. Free WiFi. No shops in Anakiwa. Official BPP Rating: 91% Online BPP Rating: 92%
